name: pferd
description: Programm zum Flotten Einfachen Runterladen von Dateien

repo.name: PFERD
repo.description: Programm zum Flotten, Einfachen Runterladen von Dateien

readme.summary: Excellent README with clear examples and installation options, though troubleshooting guidance is minimal.
readme.top_issue: No troubleshooting section for common errors like authentication failures, network issues, or permission problems

injection_risks.description: The load_config_parser function uses the configparser.ConfigParser class which can be vulnerable to interpolation attacks if not properly configured. However, in this case, interpolation is disabled.
The --link-regex argument is used to specify a regular expression for matching hrefs. If this input is not properly sanitized, it could lead to a regex injection vulnerability.

critical_findings: Potential regex injection vulnerability in the --link-regex argument
security.summary: The code has some potential security issues, including a possible regex injection vulnerability and lack of input validation, but overall it appears to be well-structured and secure.

common_complaints: ILIAS platform compatibility issues (changing UI, unsupported content types)
Missing download features (embedded videos, subtitles, forum attachments)
Content handling edge cases (Info vs Content tabs, not-yet-available content)
sentiment.summary: Community shows moderate frustration with a fragile web crawler struggling to keep pace with ILIAS platform changes; minimal maintainer engagement and growing backlog of unresolved issues suggest potential project stagnation.

communication.summary: The maintainer provides helpful and clear responses, showing patience with repeated questions and maintaining a good communication style.

concerns: No commits in past 6 months despite last commit being in December 2025
26 open issues with no recent activity or resolution
No closed issues in past 6 months indicates no active issue management
No merged PRs in past 6 months suggests no active development
No active contributors in past 6 months
Unknown last release date suggests release process is stalled
maintenance.summary: The pferd package appears to be abandoned with no maintenance activity for 6 months and a growing backlog of unresolved issues.

changelog.summary: The changelog is well-organized and comprehensive, but lacks clear marking of breaking changes and migration guides.

project_metrics.description: Programm zum Flotten, Einfachen Runterladen von Dateien

analysis_summary.doc_summary: The README provides a good overview of the package's functionality and installation, but lacks troubleshooting information.
concerns: Low number of merged PRs in the past six months
Community: Files listed under 'info' instead of 'content'
Security: Potential regex injection vulnerability in the --link-regex argument
highlights: Recent commits and releases within the last year
Some contributor activity over the past six months
